text: Romance of the Redwoods is a 1939 American film directed by Charles Vidor based on the novel by Jack London. ==Cast== *Charles Bickford *Jean Parker ==References== ==External links== * * *Romance of the Redwoods at BFI Category:1939 films Category:American adventure films Category:1939 adventure films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American films Category:Films set in forests Category:Films based on works by Jack London
title: Romance of the Redwoods (1939 film)
